name: Transcendent Automaton
title: Marionette Swordmaster
desc: That unerring strike has been delivered countless times.

source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Maguu Kenki at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A2501], equip this card.
After $[A2501] equips this card, immediately use $[S25012] once.
After your $[A2501], who has this card equipped, uses $[S25012], you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your $[A2501], who has this card equipped, uses $[S25013].
(You must have $[A2501] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
